EmailTemplate.name: Global_Product_GPDB Ignite campaign_Q415.GPDB OSS Launch Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing Greenplum: The World’s First Open Source MPP Data Warehouse
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/news/introducing-greenplum-worlds-first-open-source-mpp-data-warehouse?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=Global_Product_GPDB_Ignite_campaign_Email%20#2_Q415> On October 28th, Pivotal unveiled the world’s first massively parallel processing (MPP) data warehouse to open source: Greenplum Database <http://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/news/introducing-greenplum-worlds-first-open-source-mpp-data-warehouse?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=Global_Product_GPDB_Ignite_campaign_Email%20#2_Q415>. Built over the past 10 years, with nearly two million lines of code, Greenplum Database is the last of our core data solutions to be released under the Apache Software 2.0 license.
This announcement has received a positive response throughout the industry. Here are a few of our favorite articles:
- Greenplum goes open source -- and a new cloud analytics star is born
- Open Sourced Greenplum Data Warehouse Now on GitHub
- Big Open Source Week for EMC - Part 2: Greenplum is now an open MPP project
At Pivotal, our mission is to transform how the world builds software. Greenplum’s release completes our vision to engage more openly across the technology communities we affect. If you would like to be a part of the Greenplum Database open source community, check out these new resources:
- Greenplum Database site <http://greenplum.org/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=Global_Product_GPDB_Ignite_campaign_Email%20#2_Q415> - Greenplum Database code on GitHub <https://github.com/greenplum-db/gpdb?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=Global_Product_GPDB_Ignite_campaign_Email%20#2_Q415> - Greenplum Database sandbox on GitHub <https://github.com/greenplum-db/gpdb-sandbox-tutorials?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=Global_Product_GPDB_Ignite_campaign_Email%20#2_Q415>
Want more?
- Join us on November 17th for a webinar on How Data Science is Preventing College Dropouts and Advancing Student Success.
- View the latest Pivotal Academy <http://pivotal.io/academy?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=Global_Product_GPDB_Ignite_campaign_Email%20#2_Q415> schedule and register for one of our courses.
We look forward to seeing you at the next Pivotal event <http://pivotal.io/news-events>!
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
